entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:19 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: E 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Drizzle or showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 5:21 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain at times heavy near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 5:21 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:21 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 5:21 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 5:21 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 5:21 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 5:21 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
